item.title: About me
item.description:
Hi there! My name is Johann Muszynski.

I’m a junior graphics programmer at Umbra. I originally studied theoretical physics with an emphasis on scientific computing and obtained my Master’s degree in 2015.

I enjoy writing all kinds of software, but I usually gravitate towards writing graphics/system stuff in C++.

When I’m not in front of the computer, I’m outside, riding this:

TODO: add bike picture :(

My biggest cycling achievement so far is completing the 217 km Pirkan Pyöräily Gran Fondo, 2015 edition. I didn’t place very well, but I finished the longest bike ride of my life so far.
